```{r}
library(lme4)
library(flexplot)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
data_long_actions = read.csv("../data/data_processed/full_data_long.csv") %>% select(-X)
```

```{r}
data_long_actions %>% mutate(value = value - 1) -> data_long_actions
```

```{r}
data_long_actions %>% mutate(id = paste0(id, "_", compliant)) -> data_long_actions
```

```{r}
data_long_actions %>% 
  glm(data = .,
      formula = value ~ as_factor(variable) + treatment + cost, family="binomial") %>% summary()
```
```{r}
data_long_actions %>%
  filter(variable %in% c('p_choices', 'p_choices_ca')) %>% 
  glm(data = ., formula = value ~ cost + treatment) %>% summary()
```
